ext_description.note: The local rules for this entity have not been fully updated to agree with the changes in clause 4.2.
ext_description.p: An assembly_module_macro_component_join_terminal is a that implements the ARM concept of

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The assembly_module_macro_component_join_terminal shall not have a description of 'bare die component terminal', 'component termination passage join terminal', 'conductive interconnect element terminal', 'interconnect component join terminal', 'interconnect module component terminal', 'land join terminal', 'minimally defined component terminal', 'non functional land join terminal', 'packaged component join terminal', 'printed component join terminal', 'package terminal occurrence', or 'via terminal'.
